items.todoItem: Know that Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea, the city of David.
Know that even from birth Jesus was the King of the Jews.
Know that wise men receive revelation from God.
Know that wise men seek Jesus that they may worship Him.
Know that God had already foretold where Jesus would be born.
Know that the wise men were led by a star to where the baby Jesus was.
Know that a star appeared and stood over where Jesus was born.
Know that God may send warning to you in a dream.
Know that the plans of evil men cannot prevent God’s plans.
